ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Stelfreeze,Chuck Dixon,Jason Pearson,Jason Pearson,Brian Stelfreeze
ComicInfo.Summary:
Roving Reporter Dallas covers the story of a homeless man run down by gang members driving a Camaro.
Clarice tricks her folks into letting her borrow the Camaro and head down to New Orleans to attend Mardi Gras. When a drug buy goes bad, she ends up in the trunk with gang members driving the car.
Eighteen year old Laci begins to track down her parent's killers but discovers that the culprits might be members of her adopted mob family.
ComicInfo.Title: Mardi Gras Act II: Bourbon & Toulouse; Mardi Gras Act I: Bourbon & Orleans
